summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TripStars Phase 5 features: User Management CRUD, Task Assignment UX with user dropdown, Notification sound toggle, Task deletion prevention (405), Task cancellation, and Audit logging for reassignments. All 23 backend tests passed (100%). All frontend features verified working.
passed_tests: Backend: All 23 Phase 5 API tests passed (100%)
Backend: User Management CRUD - Admin can list, create, edit, reset password, deactivate/activate users
Backend: Manager can list users but cannot create/edit users
Backend: Team member cannot access user management APIs (403)
Backend: Task assignment with specific user IDs (not roles)
Backend: DELETE /api/tasks/{id} returns 405 Method Not Allowed
Backend: PATCH /api/tasks/{id}/cancel works for admin and manager
Backend: Team member cannot cancel tasks (403)
Backend: Notifications endpoint working for sound toggle feature
Backend: Audit logs capture task reassignment with old/new assignee
Frontend: User Management page loads with user table
Frontend: Create User modal with all fields (name, email, password, role)
Frontend: Edit User modal with pre-filled data
Frontend: Deactivate/Activate buttons visible and functional
Frontend: Sound toggle button in notification dropdown
Frontend: Task creation modal with user dropdown (shows actual users)
Frontend: Audit Logs page shows task_reassigned entries with old/new assignee details
seed_data_creation: Test users created with TEST_ prefix and deactivated after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 5 testing complete. All User Management CRUD operations working. Task deletion returns 405 as expected. Task cancellation via /cancel endpoint working. Notification sound toggle in frontend working. Audit logs capture task reassignments with old/new assignee metadata. Test file at /app/tests/test_phase5_backend.py covers all Phase 5 features.
